Title: Valentine's Day Massacre
Plot: Joey questions Dawson's state of mind when he and Pacey decide to lead their friends to a secret location party hosted by a group infamous for their complete and utter debauchery. Back at home, Jack's ex-girlfriend arrives from Rhode Island nursing a broken heart but is unaware of Jack's coming out last year and Jen's first date with Henry is a Valentine's Day she won't soon forget.
GuestStars: Alex Breckenridge, Jennifer Keddy, Robert Boris, Alison Robertson, Michael Hagerty
